admin.enterCredentials: Enter your credentials to access the admin panel

article.title: Title
article.tabViewDescription: Switch to tab view to edit each language individually
article.copyWarning: This operation will overwrite all edited content. Please proceed with caution. Are you sure you want to copy?

status.addFilesToGetStarted: Upload some files to get started
status.addVideosToGetStarted: Add some online videos to get started

validation.enterValidUrl: Please enter a valid YouTube or Bilibili URL

placeholder.enterCustomTitle: Enter a custom title for this video
placeholder.leaveEmptyForDefault: Leave empty to use default language content

settings.configureBlogSystem: Configure your blog system global settings
settings.configureSiteInfo: Configure your blog site's basic information and display options
settings.titleDescription: This will be displayed in browser tab and website header
settings.enterSiteSubtitle: Brief description of your blog content
settings.subtitleDescription: This will be displayed below the site title, briefly introducing your blog
settings.footerDescription: Custom footer text (GitHub author info will always be displayed)
settings.viewCountDescription: Control whether to display view count statistics on article pages
settings.previewDescription: View the effect of your site information settings
settings.blogSubtitle: A minimalist space for sharing thoughts and insights
settings.showArticleViewCountDesc: Display the number of unique visitors for each article
settings.siteInformationDesc: Configure your site's basic information (Chinese - Default)
settings.siteTitleDesc: This will appear in the header and browser title.
settings.siteSubtitleDesc: A brief description that appears on the homepage.
settings.previewDesc: How your site information will appear
settings.languageConfigurationDesc: Configure which languages are available for article translation. The admin interface will remain in Chinese/English only.
settings.languageNote: Chinese and English are required and cannot be disabled as they are used for the admin interface.
settings.translationAPIDesc: Configure third-party translation services for automatic article translation
settings.apiConfigNote: Configure your preferred translation service to enable automatic translation features in the article editor. API keys are stored locally in your browser.
settings.googleFreeDesc: Free Google Translate - No API key required, may have limitations
settings.libretranslateDesc: Open source translation - Can be self-hosted or use public instance
settings.mymemoryDesc: Free translation service with optional API key for higher limits
settings.deeplDesc: High quality translations for European and Asian languages
settings.manageSettings: Manage your site settings and translations
settings.googleFreeItem: Google Translate (Free): No API key needed, may have rate limits
settings.libretranslateItem: LibreTranslate: Open source, privacy-focused, can be self-hosted
settings.mymemoryItem: MyMemory: Free with generous limits, optional API key for more
settings.deeplItem: DeepL: Best quality for European and Asian languages
settings.openaiItem: OpenAI: Context-aware, best for technical content
settings.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
settings.recoveryModeWarning: System is currently in password recovery mode, please follow the instructions to complete the recovery
settings.disableRecoveryMode: Please disable recovery mode and restart the application
settings.confirmDeleteSocialMedia: Are you sure you want to delete this social media link?
settings.logoFormats: Supports PNG, JPG, JPEG, SVG, WebP formats, max 5MB
settings.faviconFormats: Supports ICO, PNG, SVG formats, max 1MB, recommended 32x32 pixels

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: View insights about your blog's performance

rss.rssDescription: Subscribe to RSS feeds to get the latest article updates
rss.rssInfo1: RSS links support multi-language parameters, you can subscribe to articles in different languages
rss.rssInfo2: All Articles RSS contains the latest articles from all categories
rss.rssInfo3: Category RSS contains only articles from specific categories
rss.rssInfo4: RSS feeds are automatically updated, no manual refresh needed
rss.rssInfo5: Recommended to use RSS readers like Feedly, Inoreader for subscription

seo.seoTitleDescription: Title displayed in search engine results, recommended under 60 characters
seo.seoDescriptionDescription: Description displayed in search engine results, recommended under 160 characters
seo.seoKeywordsDescription: Keywords to help search engines understand the article content
seo.seoSlugDescription: Friendly URL path for the article, only letters, numbers and hyphens allowed

site.title: Minimalist Blog
site.description: A minimalist blog space with dark mode support
